content.query:
-- create external data source
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE taxi_data_bronze_raw
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'https://wggsynapselakegen2.dfs.core.windows.net/'
    )

--VIEW 

IF OBJECT_ID('TAXI_ZONE', 'V') IS NOT NULL  
    DROP VIEW TAXI_ZONE;  
GO  

CREATE VIEW TAXI_ZONE AS  
SELECT  
    *  
FROM  
    OPENROWSET(  
        BULK 'datalake-synapse/nyc_green_taxi_data/raw/taxi_zone.csv', 
        DATA_SOURCE = 'taxi_data_bronze_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',  
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',  
        FIRSTROW = 2  
    ) WITH (  
        LocationID INT,  
        Borough NVARCHAR(100),  
        Zone NVARCHAR(100),  
        service_zone NVARCHAR(50)  
    ) AS [result];
